author: tiagoh
body:
I am trying to upgrade using homebrew the powershell tap, but it always requires a password.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/162854/108347128-77b69700-71e0-11eb-853f-a9d7ecb05388.png)

Trying to uninstall presents the same behavior... 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/162854/108347234-93ba3880-71e0-11eb-857e-33b09c05fe67.png)

comments.author: jborean93
comments.body:
The password it is asking for is for the `sudo` call so it can remove and add some files your normal user cannot access. This is your password and not something specifically for PowerShell.

The same thing will happen when you do `sudo whoami` or any other command with sudo.

title: Can't upgrage via homebrew on Mac OS
